Text: You like my sexy hat big boy?

choice1.Value: I am pretty aroused by it tbh. But it would look better on my floor.
choice1.Text: I never take this hat off. Even in the sprawling arms of my lovers. You do NOT want to see what’s underneath

choice2.Value: In that case, could you play me a song about your hat?
choice2.Text: *Musical interlude as Lalo sings about his hat*

choice1.Value: Wow that is hot, wanna fuck?

choice2.Value: See, I can sing too: 'La lo I like hats la lo'
choice2.Text: How do you know my name????? This is creepy I’m out of here.

choice2.Value: Yeah of course, Zelda is my favorite!
